original_text: Then I heard a loud voice speak from God's house in heaven. It said to the seven angels, ‘Take your seven bowls that are full of God's anger. Go and pour them out on the earth.’
korean_text: 또 내가 들으니 성전에서 큰 음성이 나서 일곱 천사에게 말하되 너희는 가서 하나님의 진노의 일곱 대접을 땅에 쏟으라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Then I heard a loud voice
speak from God's house in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘에 있는 하나님의 집에서 말하는 것을

sentences.original_text: It said to the seven angels
that are full of God's anger
Go and pour them out on the earth
